subject: Baseball
World Series
Television
lead_paragraph: Pablo Sandoval’s three home runs to lead the Giants to an 8-3 victory over the Tigers on Wednesday night could not prevent it from being the least-viewed opener on record, according to Nielsen.
snippet: Pablo Sandoval’s three home runs to lead the Giants to an 8-3 victory over the Tigers on Wednesday night could not prevent it from being the least-viewed opener on record, according to Nielsen.
